<title level="1" right="Rules">[General Skill Activities](/Rules.aspx?ID=1779)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 517</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Most skill activities are associated with only one skill; general skill activities are associated with more than one. Each indicates which skills may be used with it. Some skills may only be used in specific circumstances.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
